resources.string: Password must contain at least 10 characters.
Sign up not possible, check if the e-mail address is correct
Signing in failed, please check credentials
Cannot use this funcionality without location permission
Funcinality only available with lacation permission granted, to do so go to app settings
Allow MapMyArea app to acces location?

In this step you want to define your map boundaries. In order to do that select two spots on the displayed map corresponding to two corners of the territory you want to include in your map. To reset this setting long click on the map.
The area you want to select is to big. Try to select smaller area.

In this step you want to set points on your map such as buildings, service points, parkings and other relevant places. In order to do that click on the map where you want to place the point of interest and follow further instructions.

In this step you want to define how many floors there are in the created building and what are the levels. To add the lower floor click \"Add below\" button. To add the higher floor click \"Add above\" button. To remove floors click \"Remove first\" and \"Remove last\" buttons. In order to add rooms on the floors, click the floor label. Removing the floor will remove rooms on that floor.
The building must consist of at least one floor.
Don\'t kid me. Burj Khalifa is the highest building in the world with 163 floors ;)
